remarks: Lemma for ~ isfin2-2 .  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 31-Oct-2014.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 16-May-2015.)
statement:
fin23lem11.1 $e |- ( z = ( A \ x ) -> ( ps <-> ch ) ) $.
fin23lem11.2 $e |- ( w = ( A \ v ) -> ( ph <-> th ) ) $.
fin23lem11.3 $e |- ( ( x C_ A /\ v C_ A ) -> ( ch <-> th ) ) $.
fin23lem11 $p |- ( B C_ ~P A -> ( E. x e. { c e. ~P A | ( A \ c ) e. B } A. w e. { c e. ~P A | ( A \ c ) e. B } -. ph -> E. z e. B A. v e. B -. ps ) ) $.
$d A c v w x z $.
$d B c v w x z $.
$d ch z $.
$d ph v $.
$d ps x $.
$d th w $.
